mapper.select: SELECT U.uname, U.uphoneno, UPPER(SUBSTRING(U.uemail,1,1)) AS theFirstLetterOfEmail, CB.CODE_NAME AS profileBgColor, CA.CODE_NAME AS udepartment, U.uemail FROM User U LEFT JOIN CodeTable CA ON CA.CODE_TYPE='002' AND CA.CODE=U.udepartment LEFT JOIN CodeTable CB ON CB.CODE_TYPE='007' AND CB.CODE=U.profileBgColor WHERE U.uno = #{uno}
SELECT CODE_TYPE, CODE, CODE_NAME FROM CodeTable WHERE CODE_TYPE = 002
SELECT date_format(`mregdate`, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, count(*) as value FROM Milestones WHERE pno=#{pno} AND mregdate BETWEEN #{startdate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY date
